items.title: Drive to Las Vegas
items.description: ~4.5 hour drive via I-15 N. Optional stop in Barstow for gas/food.

items.title: Check in at Horseshoe Las Vegas
items.location: 3645 S Las Vegas Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89109
items.description: Central Strip location. Explore casino + arcade after check-in.

items.title: Bellagio Fountains + Light Gambling
items.description: Bellagio fountains walk, light gambling, drinks. Early sleep — big days ahead.

days.label: Day 2 — Thursday, Feb 19 (Aquarium + Romantic Strip Night)

items.title: Sleep In + Coffee Near Hotel
items.description: Slow morning. Grab coffee near the hotel before heading out.

items.title: Shark Reef Aquarium
items.location: Mandalay Bay, 3950 S Las Vegas Blvd
items.description: 2 x Adult timed-entry tickets. Enter within the hour of reserved time. Order #Y3P-NPY-HFLH.

items.title: Strip Exploration + LINQ Promenade
items.description: Walk, shops, photos, and casual exploring.

items.title: Dinner — Mon Ami Gabi
items.location: Paris Las Vegas, 3655 S Las Vegas Blvd
items.description: Romantic French bistro. Request patio seating facing fountains.

items.title: Arcade Time at Horseshoe
items.description: Arcade time and light casino fun.

items.title: Romantic Strip Stroll
items.description: End the night with a romantic walk along the Strip.

days.label: Day 3 — Friday, Feb 20 (Hard Hike + Seafood Buffet Night)

items.title: Drive to Red Rock Canyon — Ice Box Canyon Trail
items.location: 1000 Scenic Loop Dr, Las Vegas, NV
items.description: HARD HIKE DAY. Trail: Ice Box Canyon — ~6 miles round trip, boulder scrambling, shaded canyon sections. Physically demanding, no ropes required. One of the most 'real hike' experiences near Vegas. Drive ~30 min from hotel. Scenic Drive requires timed entry reservation (~$20 vehicle entry or national parks pass). Book ahead on BLM reservation site.

items.title: Return + Shower + Nap
items.description: Rest and recharge after the hike. Desert dehydration is real — hydrate well.

items.title: A.Y.C.E. Buffet — Lobster & Crab Night
items.location: Palms Casino Resort, 4321 W Flamingo Rd
items.description: Seafood-focused buffet. Sushi, lobster, crab, desserts.

items.title: Strip Night Walk + Drinks
items.description: Relaxed wandering, bars, photos.

items.title: Brunch — Din Tai Fung
items.description: Soup dumplings and share plates.

items.title: Explore Venetian + Forum Shops
items.description: Indoor canals, shopping, photo spots.

items.title: Late Lunch — Momofuku
items.location: The Cosmopolitan, 3708 S Las Vegas Blvd
items.description: Modern Asian-American dining.

items.title: Round1 Bowling & Arcade
items.location: Meadows Mall, 4300 Meadows Ln, Las Vegas, NV
items.description: Main arcade stop. Japanese crane machines, rhythm games, prize machines everywhere. Plan 1.5–2 hours. Winner buys drinks!

items.title: Game Nest Arcade
items.description: Secondary arcade — claw machines, import Japanese cabinets, less crowded enthusiast vibe. Plan 45–60 mins.

items.title: Cirque du Soleil
items.description: 2 tickets. Arrive 30–45 minutes early.

items.title: Dinner — Best Friend
items.location: Park MGM, 3770 S Las Vegas Blvd
items.description: Energetic Korean-Mexican fusion. Great post-show vibe.

items.title: Arcade Rematch or Rooftop Drinks
items.description: End the night with a final arcade session or wind down with rooftop drinks.

items.title: Coffee + Casual Morning Walk
items.description: Slow final morning, photos, souvenirs.

items.title: Check out of Horseshoe
items.description: Depart by late morning.

items.title: Drive Home
items.description: ~4.5 hours via I-15 S. Leave early to avoid Sunday traffic.
